img_above_text:
* **Rewards:** Rock Solid Spell, Keeness of Tiger, Mind Core x1, Silk x3, 1652 Experience, 1362 Will
## Where to Find the Tiger Vanguard
img_below_text:
As a required boss, you won't be able to proceed to the Chapter 2 End Boss without defeating and him and obtaning one half of the Key Items needed to open various doors in Chapter 2's Yellow Wind Ridge.
![Wukong Tiger 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/38/Wukong_Tiger_1.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist navigating through a rocky and barren landscape. This image is related to the context of encountering the Tiger Vanguard, a required boss in Chapter 2. Defeating the Tiger Vanguard is essential to proceed to the Chapter 2 End Boss and to obtain one of the Key Items needed to open various doors in Chapter 2's Yellow Wind Ridge.
